Speed Cubing

During my high school years, I cultivated a passion for Speed Cubing. I primarily focused on solving 3x3 Rubik's cubes and consistently achieved an average solve time of around 12 seconds. In 2018, I had the exciting opportunity to participate in Bangladesh's inaugural WCA (World Cube Association) competition. My performance was strong enough to advance to the semi-final round. For more details, please visit my WCA account.

I have also participated in several other cubing competitions.

  • 3Ã—3 Rubik's cube competition, Dhaka Spring Open 2018, Semifinalist
  • Rubik's cube competition, DRMC 9th National Science Carnival-2016, 2nd position
  • Rubik's cube competition, Holy Cross 13th Inter College Science Festival 2015, 2nd position
  • Rubik's cube competition, SAGC Science Festival 2015, 3rd position
